news.title: Pharmacy Club Volunteers at Local Clinic
news.description: Members volunteered at a community clinic, helping to provide free medication counselling and health screenings to residents. The event highlighted the role of pharmacists in preventative care and community engagement.

news.title: New Partnership with Hospital Pharmacy
news.description: Our club has partnered with the University Hospital’s pharmacy department to offer mentorship opportunities. Students will shadow hospital pharmacists and learn about clinical workflows and patient safety.

news.title: Award for Excellence in Community Service
news.description: The Pharmacy Club received the University’s Community Service Award for its ongoing outreach initiatives. The award recognizes student organizations that make a measurable impact on public health and wellbeing.
